page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: { We have found about 40 clubs or groups in Sidlesham. They include things like Scouts, Guides and Brownies for children and aerobics and Darts Club for adults. Every age is covered. There is a Playschool for under-fives and the Good Companions for old people The old people meet regularly and do hand-crafts which they sell. The money pays for their outings and a mini-van. There are church clubs,a Bible study group run by the vicar,the Sunday School and the Thursday Club for games and crafts. There is a British Legion group and a Red Cross group and a Football Club in the village There is a nature reserve in the village and the friends of Pagham Harbour help to look affer it.
